https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/sML8joYwDebArkLbgBkz9KlVs9H.jpg Akkarakazhchakal: The Movie is a 2011 American Malayalam film based upon the popular TV series Akkara Kazhchakal. The Thekkinmuttil family decides to send Appachan and Ammachi to an old-age home in Kerala. To take a break out of their regular lives they decide to make the long-pending trip to Niagara Falls. Akkarakazhchakal - The Movie
